title: 宣传栏里的服务器版宣传申请点不开
txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/plugin.php?id=mcbbs_ad:ad_manage&type=server模版文件未找到或者无法访问: ./source/plugin/mcbbs_ad/template/buy_serverad.htm, ./template/default/buy_serverad.htm
PHP Debug

[Line: 0047]plugin.php(include)
[Line: 0106]source/plugin/mcbbs_ad/ad_manage.inc.php(include)
[Line: 0029]/data/attachment_data/data/template/30_mcbbs_ad_ad_manage.tpl.php(template)
[Line: 0649]source/function/function_core.php(checktplrefresh)
[Line: 0504]source/function/function_core.php(template->parse_template)
[Line: 0037]source/class/class_template.php(template->error)
[Line: 0425]source/class/class_template.php(discuz_error::template_error)
[Line: 0046]source/class/discuz/discuz_error.php(discuz_error::system_error)
[Line: 0024]source/class/discuz/discuz_error.php(discuz_error::debug_backtrace)复制代码

进不去也不知道什么意思

replies.txt_content: 还没做好的页面，不小心传上来了，无视之
